import { useEffect } from "react" import { useState } from "react" import { putUserToDatabase } from "../../services/userServices" export const EditProfile = ({ user }) => { const [profile, setProfile] = useState({}) const handleInput = (event) => { const copy = { ...profile } const name = event.target.name const value = event.target.value copy[name] = value console.log("copy", copy) setProfile(copy) } const handleUpdate = () => { putUserToDatabase(profile).then(() => { }) } useEffect(() => { setProfile(user) }, [user]) return (

Edit Profile Information
